description: Update information about a command or mark a command for deprecation.

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the command to be updated.

nested_items.name: commandId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the command.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The updated user-friendly display name in the console for the command.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The updated text description of the command.

nested_items.name: deprecated
nested_items.description: The boolean that indicates whether the command was deprecated.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time (epoch timestamp in seconds) when the command was last updated.
